name: Prayer Gamer
description:
You have the unique ability to walk amongst the souls of those, who are no longer with us. One day, on a wander through the ghost dimension, you find a helpless, crying child, begging for help; he says he needs a mustard seed to go to heaven. The issue? The spice salesman has inflated the price so much, you can barely even dream of affording the rarity!
...unless...

Journey through the ghost dimension to find items to trade with your village's locals and earn your way up to the mustard seed needed to bring rest to the soul of an innocent child.  Listen to absurd demands of the traders and try to make sense of the world around you, be it inhabited by ghosts or people.

---

Controls:

  • [W] [A] [S] [D] - Walking
  • [Shift] - Interact (trade with NPCs/pick up items)
  • [ESC] - Pause game, see inventory contents and check quest progress
  • [Space] - Place shrine in the ghost world, progress through dialog
  • Mouse - Position light
